metadata.title: CVE-2020-11868 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: ntpd in ntp before 4.2.8p14 and 4.3.x before 4.3.100 allows an off-pathattacker to block unauthenticated synchronization via a server mode packetwith a spoofed source IP address, because transmissions are rescheduledeven when a packet lacks a valid origin timestamp.

criterions.comment: ntpsec package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
ntpsec package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
